Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the Raptors' pre-season opener
The game was played in Montreal at the Bell Centre
Chris Boucher, a Montreal native, had a strong performance with 13 points and 6 rebounds
Others: RJ Barrett led all scorers with 17 points before exiting the game with a bruised right shoulder
Jordan Poole led the Wizards with 16 points and 6 assists
The Raptors will play the Wizards again on Friday before a home-and-home series with the Boston Celtics
